post:
These custom Kvm solutions allow clients to setup the file system and partitions how they want. No templates, no default file system type, clients can pick and choose how they want the system setup just like a dedicate server. Custom made to fit the clients needs, full access with vnc console so you can troubleshoot your system without a public network interface. Premium Bandwidth 99.99% uptime! Our location is Southeast US, Tampa,Florida. We use only the best hardware to guarantee uptime and stability and we never oversell our nodes. 

When you order any of our Virtual Dedicated Server plans and like us on Facebook use this code to receive a 15% OFF DISCOUNT. CODE: P0Q8TU89BNX6AJ
